FuncDef:
The scramble command enables the payload scrambling function on a 10GE WAN interface.
The undo scramble command disables the payload scrambling function.
By default, the payload scrambling function is enabled on a 10GE WAN interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent consecutive 1s or 0s and facilitate clock signal extraction on the receiver, run the scramble command to enable the payload scrambling function on a 10GE WAN interface.
Configuration Impact
Disabling the payload scrambling function may deteriorate the quality of clock signals extracted by the receiver.
Precautions
The status of the payload scrambling function (enabled or disabled) on the interface must be consistent with that on the transmission devices.
